body.name: The Original Korcci 3 Quart Microwave Glass Popcorn Popper, Borosilicate Glass, Dishwasher Safe, 3-in-1 Silicone Lid, BPA Free, Family Size (Blue)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 7 hrs 36 mins
features: [UNIQUE DESIGN] : This Microwave popcorn popper bowl made of borosilicate glass is very durable and resistant to high temperatures. The unique design of the bowl can spread the heat evenly, so that the corn kernels are fully popped. There are almost no unpopped corn kernels. You can get delicious popcorn in 2-3 minutes.

[SIMPLE OPERATION] : This microwavable popcorn maker bowl is very easy to use, you only need to use the dual-function lid to measure the required amount (1-2 lid of kernels), pour it into the Micro-Pop, and put it in the microwave for 2-3 minutes. You can get delicious popcorn. Compared with bagged popcorn, this homemade popcorn bowl is healthier and more hygienic. You can experience the fun of making popcorn with your family and friends.

[MULTIFUNCTIONAL LID] : You can use the dual-function lid of the popcorn popper bowl to measure the required corn kernels. You can also put butter or seasoning in the lid, the perforated lid can be used to melt the butter or seasoning when the popcorn pops and distribute it evenly on the popcorn and make popcorn with your favorite flavor. If you don't want to add any oil, you can omit this operation to make oil-free popcorn.
[EASY TO CLEAN] : This glass popcorn maker bowl is suitable for dishwashers. You can put it directly in the dishwasher for quick and easy cleaning.

[RISK-FREE PURCHASE] : We are so proud of our microwave glass popcorn popper bowl, we give you the 30 days 100% satisfaction, money-back guarantee, so you can buy and use it with confidence. If you are not satisfied with our product or purchase, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A great way to get healthy and delicious popcorn KORCCI microwave glass popcorn popper provides you with a healthy way to make popcorn. Bagged popcorn is full of harmful chemicals, which can have a negative impact on the health of you and your family. KORCCI's high temperature safe borosilicate glass bowl is safe to use and simple to operate. Just put your corn kernels in a bowl and heat in the microwave for a few minutes to get fresh, delicious and healthy popcorn.

Perfect Details , Supreme Enjoyment KORCCI is committed to let each of our customers enjoy the supreme experience. Therefore, we strive to make every detail of our products perfect. This glass popcorn bowl is made of borosilicate glass and food-grade silica gel, which can withstand high temperatures and is very safe when used in a microwave oven. It can be washed by hand or in a dishwasher, and it is very easy to clean. The main body of the glass popcorn and the edges of the wide mouth, as well as the silicone handles and lids, have been carefully polished. The surface is very smooth, so there is no need to worry about accidentally hurting your hands during use. We carefully consider that in order to facilitate everyone to get delicious and healthy popcorn, our lid can be not only a measuring cup of corn kernels, but also a tray of seasonings.

Every step just right allows us to get invincible and delicious popcorn Tips for getting more delicious popcorn: Not all microwaves work exactly the same, try a little bit-your microwave may cook popcorn faster or slower than the average 2:30-3:00!If you are worried that your popcorn will be burnt when you add butter before popping, try to wait until all the corn kernels have turned into beautiful puffed popcorn before adding butter.Popcorn is recommended to be eaten in time, and the rest is stored in an airtight container. It is not recommended to refrigerate.It is not recommended to stop and start the microwave oven during cooking. Once the microwave oven is stopped, the steam accumulated in the center of the corn kernel that will cause the popcorn to burst will cool down and will never reach the temperature required for re-popping. If you restart the microwave, you may also burn popcorn that has already popped. Using the sound test is the best way to determine if the popcorn is complete. If the time between ejection exceeds two seconds, it should stop.

Popper Bowl Popper machine Cream Dispenser Taco Holder 4pcs Egg Rack 2pcs Material Food-grade Silicone PC material corn spoon and lid, PP material body shell Durable All-Aluminum Canister and Head with silicone grip Stainless Steel Food grade 304 Stainless Steel Size Diameter 9 3/8in, Height 5 7/8in, Folded Height 2 3/8in 4.3x4.8x10.4 in 3x12 in 8x2x3 7/8 in long leg egg rack (6 7/8" wide, 2 5/8" tall), short leg egg rack (5 7/8" wide, 2 1/4" tall) Other Attributes Dishwasher Cleaning, Microwave Safe Hot air blasting technology included 3-styled decorating tips.Rinse with water Dishwasher Cleaning. 4 PackS Dishwasher Cleaning. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product and build
reviews.reviewText: Awesome product. Good popcorn everytime once you figure out the time and listen for popping to stop

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect popcorn popper
reviews.reviewText: Love the new design. Our old microwave popcorn popper was all glass and it broke. Bought this one, the added plastic protects the glass and the handle doesn’t get hot. Only drawback is that it takes approximately 30 seconds longer than the old one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great, no oil
reviews.reviewText: Works great. Using the silicone cover to melt butter works fine but is a bit messy on clean up. I usually melt butter in a separate glass container

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It does not work well
reviews.reviewText: It did not work as I expected it to. I followed the directions well. However Most of the corn was still not popped. I tried leaving it a little longer in the hopes that it would pop, but all it did was burn the popcorn that was already popped. It seemed like a great concept, it looks adorable, but unfortunately it didNot work for me. 😕

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Absolutely Love This Microwave Popcorn Popper
reviews.reviewText: This was my third popcorn maker purchase and I admit I was skeptical about a microwave popper. I had previously purchased a hot air popper that wasn't working out for me because no matter what size container I used, the popcorn would fly out of the popper and all over the counter top. The unit prior to that required oil and used a metal arm to stir the kernels to keep them popping, but I really wanted an air popper.This microwave popper turned out to be the solution for me. I set it for 5 minutes and listen for when the popping slows down, and I end up with perfect popcorn every time with very few un-popped kernels. I can melt butter if wanted in the little silicone topper and the butter distributes evenly through the popped corn. It is dishwasher safe, but can easily be hand washed, too. (Note: the popcorn setting on my microwave resulted in scorched popcorn on my first try, and that is why I set it for a 4-5 timer and keep an eye on it).The popcorn tastes really good, too. I would not hesitate to recommend this style to anyone who is looking for a microwave popcorn maker.

reviews.reviewText: It popped the corn but that was it we had to heat up butter and put it on

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 23, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It works but it's a good job I have a large microwave tho.Still trying to get seasoning to work tho.

I’ve given up on several methods of air popping corn, this is my favourite.I did make sure to read as many reviews of this type as I could find. It looked to me as if some were the original and others were copies that broke. Done buy the cheapest, and read up.
